languages.text: "Я подоспел вовремя и казнил изменника Френзо, принял командование и велел отряду вернуться на заставу для занятия обороны. Но блокпост, оставленный без охраны, уже был захвачен мутантами, проникшими по лифтовой шахте. Они выманили нас и заняли наши укрепления".

"I arrived just in time to execute the traitor Frensoe and reclaim control. I ordered the squad to return to the post and take up a defensive position, but it was already overrun by mutants entering through the elevator shaft. They lured us out and then seized our fortifications."
languages.original_text: "Я подоспел вовремя и казнил изменника Френзо, принял командование и велел отряду вернуться на заставу для занятия обороны. Но блокпост, оставленный без охраны, уже был захвачен мутантами, проникшими по лифтовой шахте. Они выманили нас и заняли наши укрепления".

traits.locale_text: "I arrived just in time to execute the traitor Frensoe, take command, and order the squad to return to the post and take defence. But it had already been overrun by mutants who had invaded through the elevator shaft. They lured us out and took over our fortifications."

"I arrived just in time to execute the traitor Frensoe, take command, and order the squad to return to the post and take defence. But it had already been overrun by mutants who had invaded through the elevator shaft. They lured us out and took over our fortifications."

"I arrived just in time to execute the traitor Frensoe and reclaim control. I ordered the squad to return to the post and take up a defensive position, but it was already overrun by mutants entering through the elevator shaft. They lured us out and then seized our fortifications."

"I arrived just in time to execute the traitor Frensoe and reclaim control. I ordered the squad to return to the post and take up a defensive position, but it was already overrun by mutants entering through the elevator shaft. They lured us out and then seized our fortifications."

"I arrived just in time to execute the traitor Frensoe and reclaim control. I ordered the squad to return to the post and take up a defensive position, but it was already overrun by mutants entering through the elevator shaft. They lured us out and then seized our fortifications."

"I arrived just in time to execute the traitor Frensoe and reclaim control. I ordered the squad to return to the post and take up a defensive position, but it was already overrun by mutants entering through the elevator shaft. They lured us out and then seized our fortifications."

languages.text: «Llegué justo a tiempo para ejecutar al traidor Frensoe y retomar el control. Ordené al escuadrón que volviera al puesto y adoptara posiciones defensivas, pero los mutantes ya lo habían invadido desde el hueco del ascensor. Nos atrajeron al exterior para apoderarse de nuestras fortificaciones».
languages.original_text: "I arrived just in time to execute the traitor Frensoe and reclaim control. I ordered the squad to return to the post and take up a defensive position, but it was already overrun by mutants entering through the elevator shaft. They lured us out and then seized our fortifications."

traits.locale_text: «Llegué justo a tiempo para ejecutar al traidor Frensoe y retomar el control. Ordené al escuadrón que volviera al puesto y adoptara posiciones defensivas, pero los mutantes ya lo habían invadido desde el hueco del ascensor. Nos atrajeron al exterior para apoderarse de nuestras fortificaciones».

languages.text: 「裏切り者のフレンソーを処刑し、支配権を取り戻せる、なんとかぎりぎりのところで到着しました。部隊に持ち場へ戻り、防御態勢をとるよう命じましたが、そこはすでにエレベーターの昇降路から侵入した変異体に制圧されていました。奴らは我々をおびき出し、要塞を占拠したのです」
languages.original_text: "I arrived just in time to execute the traitor Frensoe and reclaim control. I ordered the squad to return to the post and take up a defensive position, but it was already overrun by mutants entering through the elevator shaft. They lured us out and then seized our fortifications."

traits.locale_text: 「裏切り者のフレンソーを処刑し、支配権を取り戻せる、なんとかぎりぎりのところで到着しました。部隊に持ち場へ戻り、防御態勢をとるよう命じましたが、そこはすでにエレベーターの昇降路から侵入した変異体に制圧されていました。奴らは我々をおびき出し、要塞を占拠したのです」

languages.text: “我及时赶到，处决了弗伦索那个叛徒，夺回了控制权。我命令小队返回哨站，建造防御工事，但变种人已经通过电梯冲进了哨站，占领了那里。敌人引诱我们离开了哨站，之后占领了我们的防御工事。”
languages.original_text: "I arrived just in time to execute the traitor Frensoe and reclaim control. I ordered the squad to return to the post and take up a defensive position, but it was already overrun by mutants entering through the elevator shaft. They lured us out and then seized our fortifications."

traits.locale_text: “我及时赶到，处决了弗伦索那个叛徒，夺回了控制权。我命令小队返回哨站，建造防御工事，但变种人已经通过电梯冲进了哨站，占领了那里。敌人引诱我们离开了哨站，之后占领了我们的防御工事。”

languages.text: "Ich bin gerade noch rechtzeitig gekommen, um den Verräter Frensoe hinzurichten und die Kontrolle zurückzuerlangen. Ich habe dem Trupp befehlen, zum Posten zurückzukehren und dort eine Verteidigungsposition einzunehmen, doch der Posten war bereits von Mutanten überlaufen, die durch den Aufzugschacht gekommen waren. Sie haben uns herausgelockt und dann unsere Befestigungsanlagen eingenommen."
languages.original_text: "I arrived just in time to execute the traitor Frensoe and reclaim control. I ordered the squad to return to the post and take up a defensive position, but it was already overrun by mutants entering through the elevator shaft. They lured us out and then seized our fortifications."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin gerade noch rechtzeitig gekommen, um den Verräter Frensoe hinzurichten und die Kontrolle zurückzuerlangen. Ich habe dem Trupp befehlen, zum Posten zurückzukehren und dort eine Verteidigungsposition einzunehmen, doch der Posten war bereits von Mutanten überlaufen, die durch den Aufzugschacht gekommen waren. Sie haben uns herausgelockt und dann unsere Befestigungsanlagen eingenommen."

languages.text: « Je suis arrivé juste à temps pour exécuter ce traître de Frensoe et reprendre le contrôle de la situation. Avec l'escouade, on est immédiatement retournés au poste pour le défendre, mais il était déjà infesté de mutants qui étaient passés par la cage d'ascenseur. Ils nous ont attirés hors de son enceinte et en ont profité pour s'emparer de nos fortifications. »
languages.original_text: "I arrived just in time to execute the traitor Frensoe and reclaim control. I ordered the squad to return to the post and take up a defensive position, but it was already overrun by mutants entering through the elevator shaft. They lured us out and then seized our fortifications."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis arrivé juste à temps pour exécuter ce traître de Frensoe et reprendre le contrôle de la situation. Avec l'escouade, on est immédiatement retournés au poste pour le défendre, mais il était déjà infesté de mutants qui étaient passés par la cage d'ascenseur. Ils nous ont attirés hors de son enceinte et en ont profité pour s'emparer de nos fortifications. »

languages.text: "Hain Frensoe'yu öldürüp kontrolü ele almak için tam vaktinde yetiştim. Mangayı geri gönderip savunma hatlarına konuşlanmaları için emir verdim ama asansör boşluğundan gelen mutantlar, orayı çoktan ele geçirmişti. Bizi dışarı çekip tahkimatlarımızı aldılar."
languages.original_text: "I arrived just in time to execute the traitor Frensoe and reclaim control. I ordered the squad to return to the post and take up a defensive position, but it was already overrun by mutants entering through the elevator shaft. They lured us out and then seized our fortifications."
